Front: お世話になっております
Back:
Meaning: Thank you for your continued support
Example: お世話になっております。本件について後ほどご連絡いたします。
English: Thank you for your continued support. I will contact you later regarding this matter.

Meaning: I will check
Example: 確認いたします。本件について後ほどご連絡いたします。
English: I will check. I will contact you later regarding this matter.

Meaning: Understood
Example: 承知しました。本件について後ほどご連絡いたします。
English: Understood. I will contact you later regarding this matter.

Meaning: Sorry to trouble you, but
Example: 恐れ入りますが。本件について後ほどご連絡いたします。
English: Sorry to trouble you, but. I will contact you later regarding this matter.

Meaning: Please check
Example: ご確認ください。本件について後ほどご連絡いたします。
English: Please check. I will contact you later regarding this matter.

Meaning: Certainly
Example: かしこまりました。本件について後ほどご連絡いたします。
English: Certainly. I will contact you later regarding this matter.

Front: ご都合はいかがでしょうか
Back:
Meaning: How is your availability

English: I sincerely apologize. I will contact you later regarding this matter.

Meaning: I will consider it
Example: 検討いたします。本件について後ほどご連絡いたします。
English: I will consider it. I will contact you later regarding this matter.
